page.title: 14A BENGEO HOUSEWIFE
page.content: Pamela Blyth moved to Bengeo when she married in 1972.Her two boys are 8 and 11.She spends 8\ hours weekly teaching tap dancing but would not like to work longer as this would not leave time to run the home properly.She does 3-5 hrs housework each day and enjoys cooking. She has a fridge/freezer, autotime gas oven,food mixer,slow cook pot and deep fat frier. She usually shops in Bengeo each Friday. Milk is delivered daily. Recently, she has added more fibre to the family diet and reduced animal fat and foods with additives.She makes jam and freezes her home-grown vegetables. Breakfast is fruit and cereal,lunch is a light snack and at 18.00 is a cooked family meal.Her husband washes-up each evening,helps prepare packed lunch and often irons and helps with cleaning. Mrs.Blyth is a church member.Her other interests are reading and dressmaking.
